::Zeus/Killer/Annihilator/Ares::

Zeus dives out of the way of Sniper's shots, flying forward at the Ark. 
Seeing fresh troops emerge from the Ark, he dives at one of them, firing 
missiles at Snow Tech.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
"Taim ta die, maxi!!" Killer yells as he sees Shadow Cat emerge from the Ark. 
He jumps at her, firing a missile at her.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Annihilator turns around, seeing Snow Tech emerge from the Ark. He grins: 
more to kill! Screaming like a phcycho (who of course, he was), he runs 
forward, firing chain gun and missile launcher at the maximal.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Ares, in his vehicle mode, sees the two new maximals on the field. He rides 
forward at them, shooting his multitude of guns at both of them.
